ComicInfo.Summary: In a realm where sorcery meets science, The Masters of the Universe set forth to protect all of Eternia from the onslaught of Skeletor and his evil forces. It's an epic tale of good versus evil, with danger and suspense at every turn. The story we all loved from the '80's is reborn and relaunched for a new era. THIS ISSUE: Orko's desire to return home escalates, and he seeks out a way to return to Trolla. In the process, he discovers important clues about Eternia's past and how his ancient relatives played an important part in the history of the world they know.
